results.abstract: Another humpback whale was spotted dead late Monday, floating near a shipping channel between New York and New Jersey, the 13th whale found in the two states in three months.

media.caption: Whales wash ashore every year. But a recent uptick in deaths, including a humpback found in late January on Lido Beach in New York, concerns scientists.

results.adx_keywords: Hockey, Ice;Content Type: Personal Profile;Age, Chronological;Jagr, Jaromir;H C Kladno (Hockey Team);National Hockey League;Czech Republic;Kladno (Czech Republic)
results.title: The 51-Year-Old Hockey Star Who Won’t Quit
results.abstract: The former N.H.L. star Jaromir Jagr is playing his 35th season of pro hockey, now for his hometown team in the Czech Republic. He knows its very survival depends on him.

media.caption: At 51, Jagr is more than an aging athlete stubbornly clinging to a fading career. He still plays because he loves the game and because he can.
media.copyright: Nina Riggio for The New York Times
